articles.title: Professional dancer exposes reason why Ellie Simmonds could win Strictly 'Nailed it' - Express
articles.description: Ellie Simmonds has been impressing the judges with her talent and enthusiasm on Strictly Come Dancing. She could be in with a chance of reaching the final according to professional dancer, Gary Edwards.
